SEARCH
Package com.pds.curiousmind.model.registeredContentBlock

Class RegisteredContentBlock

java.lang.Object
com.pds.curiousmind.model.registeredContentBlock.RegisteredContentBlock
@Entity public class RegisteredContentBlock extends Object
Represents a registered content block for a user within a registered course.

This class links a ContentBlock to a RegisteredCourse and tracks the completion status of the content block for the user. It provides access to the content block's name, questions, and difficulty, as well as methods to mark the block as completed or reset its status.

Mapped to the registered_content_blocks table in the database using JPA annotations.

Key Features:

  • Links a content block to a registered course for a specific user.
  • Tracks whether the content block has been completed by the user.
  • Provides access to the content block's name, questions, and difficulty.
  • Supports marking as completed and resetting completion status.

Usage Example:

     RegisteredContentBlock rcb = new RegisteredContentBlock(registeredCourse, contentBlock);
     boolean done = rcb.isCompleted();
     rcb.markAsCompleted();
     List<Question> questions = rcb.getQuestions();
Since:
1.0
